data.name: Tap Ninja - Shogun Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Shogun Supporter pack for those who wish to support the developer of Tap Ninja.

Includes:

  • 6'500 Amber
  • Permanent VIP status
data.about_the_game:
Shogun Supporter pack for those who wish to support the developer of Tap Ninja.

Includes:

  • 6'500 Amber
  • Permanent VIP status
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Greek, Thai, Norwegian, Portuguese, Swedish, Vietnamese, Finnish, Romanian, Polish, Hungarian, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Italian, Danish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
